name: Escape the Black Hound
description:
Escape the Black Hound by the Lazy Poodle Men is a 2d top down platformer/endless runner created for Galway Game Jam 19

Avoid the black dog and do not fall in the river Corrib.

Controls: WASD to move, space to jump

Tip: Collect floating flowers to send the black dog back to hell (temporarily)!
